title: SharedDefinitions
description: Shared Definitions for the Master Data Model for Documents to use in the Open Integration Hub

label.description: Label of the document version. Most likely used for version numbering.

examples: Rescanned document due to bad quality

creation.description: Timestamp and user that created the document version

isLatestVersion.description: Flag that indicates if this is the latest version of the document

isMajorVersion.description: Flag that indicates if this is a major version of the document

size.description: Filesize of the document version in bytes

mimeType.description: Mimetype of the file content. refer to http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml

url.description: Download url for the document version.

Policy.description: Policies can describe how objects are handled by the system. Invoices, for example, must be stored in a tamper-proof environment in order to comply with local law. Therefore policies can be used to define retention or deletion policies.

DocumentProperty.description: Document properties can describe additional information depending on the documents type. e.g. Systems that allow processing images can add the image size (width/height) in pixels.

type.description: Type or identifier of the property

SubResource.description: Sub resources can be used in order to provide additional information. DMS/ECM/EIM systems usually provide additional functionality like extracting fulltext content or generating preview images of the document.

info.description: Additional information or description of the subresource

size.description: Filesize of the document version in bytes

mimeType.description: Mimetype of the sub resource content. refer to http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml

url.description: Download url for the sub resource
